title: Web-Based Blended Learning Program to Support Academic Transition for First-Year University Students (Large-Scale)

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic science concepts and elementary education field experience
context.additional_context: A program supporting academic transitions by enabling elementary school teachers to effectively acquire university-level science content through blended web-based and in-person instruction, implementable in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners engage in self-directed learning of university-level science concepts (biology/chemistry) for two hours twice weekly via web-based platforms
In face-to-face classes, learners deepen web-based learning content through discussions and experiments, achieving over 80% peer feedback participation
Learners achieve at least 70 points in the final summative assessment, meeting science competency standards required for university curricula

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
